comment: This is produced in the USA shipped to Germany bottled thenshipped back to the U.S.. This is solely for mixing try not to drink on its own its harsh.
Great replacement for the classic Jim Beam! Less oily and nutty, maybe a bit fruitier, definitely younger, but with the same corny comfort.

It's great young and fresh bourbon. Vanilla, apple, banana to taste.
It's not for wintertime nor night time   sipping. When it's summer and the sun is shining you can enjoy this wonderful bourbon on ice. Great for mixing too.
It is very good quality at this price. A bit spicy, but only at the beginning
It was fairly standard.  Fine for mixing.
Very non-descript. I wouldn't have it again. At least the price for a double in the Albuquerque airport was reasonable
